fields.title: Create Your First Project
fields.description: Begin by creating a new project from your dashboard. Add a clear name, description, and define the main objectives.

fields.title: Add Tasks and Subtasks
fields.description: Break your work into tasks and subtasks. Add due dates, priorities, and descriptions to stay organized.

fields.title: Invite Team Members
fields.description: Invite teammates to collaborate and assign appropriate roles such as Admin, Editor, Commenter, or Viewer.

fields.title: Organize Your Workflow
fields.description: Switch between List, Kanban, Calendar, or Gantt views to match your project management style.

fields.title: Set Up Automation Rules
fields.description: Build automation rules that assign tasks, update statuses, send reminders, and optimize workflow.

fields.title: Track Project Progress
fields.description: Monitor real-time progress using dashboards, milestones, and burndown charts.

fields.title: Collaborate and Communicate
fields.description: Use comments, mentions, chat, and file attachments to stay aligned with your team.

fields.title: Generate Reports
fields.description: Export professional project reports, workload summaries, and time logs.
